name: Scénario repris et rejoué
description:
LocJAM 2021 - Inclusive Quebec French translation of Script Change Replay.

Only 1 translator in this project ! :)

My main goal was to translate in such a language that I'd feel confortable with and that my friends would use during a D&D night. It's also my first try into an-all-inclusive French language, which came with a lot of unexpected issues that I tried my best to tackle.

The card weren't translated, as I lacked both the time and the resources to change them (but I will find the time in the coming weeks to at least polish this!).

Please, enjoy :)
